title: Update: What Do You Do When Your Girlfriend Has No Response To Your Proposal?
description:
You're ready to take the next step in your relationship so you propose to your girlfriend. She doesn't say "yes" but she doesn't say "no" either. She tell you she needs to think about it.
It's been over a month and she still hasn't given you an answer. So what do you do? Ask her again or not?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
